Tooltip.Actions: Show and select your action cards

Control.Label: Control
Control.Description: Manipulate positioning, balance, or leverage in melee.

Guard.Label: Guard
Guard.Description: Parry or deflect incoming attacks with technique.

Brace.Label: Brace
Brace.Description: Absorb force and stand firm against impact.

Evasion.Label: Evasion
Evasion.Description: Evade attacks through agility and trained movement.

Athletics.Label: Athletics
Athletics.Description: Perform physical feats of strength, speed, or motion.

Notice.Label: Notice
Notice.Description: Spot details, changes, or hidden elements in the environment.

Stealth.Label: Stealth
Stealth.Description: Avoid detection through silence, concealment, or timing.

Craft.Label: Craft
Craft.Description: Build, repair, or create functional equipment or tools.

Track.Label: Track
Track.Description: Follow trails, signs, and environmental disturbances.

HandleBeasts.Label: Handle Beasts
HandleBeasts.Description: Manage mounts and animals, calm or direct creatures.

Impress.Label: Impress
Impress.Description: Shape how others perceive you through presence and impact.

Influence.Label: Influence
Influence.Description: Shift another’s intentions through persuasion or pressure.

Insight.Label: Insight
Insight.Description: Read motives, patterns, and emotional cues.

Academia.Label: Academia
Academia.Description: Acquire elevated knowledge and analyze complex connections.

Folklore.Label: Folklore
Folklore.Description: Learn and recite everything from local rumors to legendary heroics, grasping traditions and their ties.

Navigate.Label: Navigate
Navigate.Description: Chart routes, orient yourself, and read terrain or maps.

Manifest.Label: Manifest
Manifest.Description: Create or project raw magical force.

Alter.Label: Alter
Alter.Description: Transform matter, bodies, or physical states.

Compel.Label: Compel
Compel.Description: Impose force on minds, spirits, or entities.

Reveal.Label: Reveal
Reveal.Description: Expose truth, detect hidden things, or gain insight.

Transpose.Label: Transpose
Transpose.Description: Shift positions, move objects, or bend states and space.

Ward.Label: Ward
Ward.Description: Create barriers, protections, or magical defenses.

Snap.Label: Snap
Snap.Description: Instant reflex response to sudden threats.

Grit.Label: Grit
Grit.Description: Bodily toughness against pain, poison, and the elements.

Resolve.Label: Resolve
Resolve.Description: Mental resilience to fear, influence, or despair.

HP.Label: Hitpoints
HP.Description: How much damage the character can take before it affects their behavior in combat.

Wounds.Label: Wounds
Wounds.Description: How many states the NPC can go through before they are brought down.

Virtue.Label: Virtue
Virtue.Description: Capacity for discipline and moral steadiness.

Ward.Label: Ward
Ward.Description: Inner boundaries, spiritual posture, personal sanctum.

Ruin.Label: Destroyer
Ruin.Description: Fracture, decay, the breaking of the self.

Ready.Label: Ready
Ready.Description: Loose items carried on the body, ready to grab or use.

Worn.Label: Worn
Worn.Description: Items worn on the body as part of the outfit.

Pack.Label: Pack
Pack.Description: Items stored in a pack and harder to access.

Camp.Label: Camp
Camp.Description: Items stored at camp and not carried.

Hand.Label: Hand
Hand.Description: Items held in hand and immediately available.

Dropped.Label: Dropped
Dropped.Description: Items on the ground and not currently usable.

Held.Label: Held
Held.Description: Items that must be held in hand to function.

Worn.Label: Worn
Worn.Description: Items that are worn on the body.

Inventory.Empty: You are not carrying any items.

Position.Label: Position
Position.Description: Shifts the character's stance or placement.

Setup.Label: Setup
Setup.Description: Prepares for upcoming impact or reactive options.

Impact.Label: Impact
Impact.Description: Carries out the decisive action during the character's turn.

Defense.Label: Defense
Defense.Description: Protective responses triggered by an external influence or event.

Strike.Label: Strike
Strike.Description: A direct attack. Extra power increases its force.

Bind.Label: Bind
Bind.Description: Locks the opponent’s weapon line and imposes bound(X).

Expose.Label: Expose
Expose.Description: Forces an opening in the opponent’s defense and applies exposed(X).

Push.Label: Push
Push.Description: Drives the opponent back and applies pushed(X).

Brace.Label: Brace
Brace.Description: Sets a firm stance; reduces incoming control effects.

Guard.Label: Guard
Guard.Description: Adopts a defensive structure; improves the next guard attempt.

Evade.Label: Evade
Evade.Description: Moves lightly out of line; improves the next evasion attempt.

Grapple.Label: Grapple
Grapple.Description: Unarmed restraint that limits the target’s movement.

Break.Label: Break
Break.Description: Shakes off negative states; reduces bound/exposed/pushed.

Grit.Label: Grit
Grit.Description: A reflexive brace drawing on the character's raw toughness.

Snap.Label: Snap
Snap.Description: Quick instinctive reflexes that answer sudden threats.

Resolve.Label: Resolve
Resolve.Description: A mental rally that steels the character's will.

Invocation.Label: Invocation
Invocation.Description: The character calls upon cosmic powers.

Switchgear.Label: Switchgear
Switchgear.Description: The character changes which items they are holding.

Move.Label: Move
Move.Description: Shift into a new region of the battlefield.

TakeCover.Label: Take Cover
TakeCover.Description: Hunker down and slip into nearby cover.

TraverseHazard.Label: Traverse Hazard
TraverseHazard.Description: Cross a dangerous obstacle by relying on athletic footing and balance.

SecurePassage.Label: Secure Passage
SecurePassage.Description: Stabilize or clear the way so others can move through safely.

Shoot.Label: Shoot
Shoot.Description: Loose a precise ranged attack with aim and timing.

Throw.Label: Throw
Throw.Description: Hurl a weapon or object to strike at distance.

LoadArrow.Label: Load Arrow
LoadArrow.Description: The character sets a new arrow and draws the bowstring.

RaiseShield.Label: Raise Shield
RaiseShield.Description: The character positions their shield against melee and ranged attacks.

QuickLoad.Label: Quick-Load
QuickLoad.Description: With a crossbow's quick-loader, the character spans the string and readies the next bolt.

Arc.Label: Arc
Arc.Description: Channel a short arcing spell of energy.

Glue.Label: Glue
Glue.Description:
Creates a small area of sticky fluid.
1-2 -> Exposed
3-4 -> Slowed
5+ -> Grabbed

RebukeEvil.Label: Rebuke Evil
RebukeEvil.Description:
Instills dread in all nearby beings with evil intent.
0-1 -> Frightened 1
2-3 -> Frightened 2
4-5 -> Frightened 3
6+ -> Frightened 4

ProtectivePrayer.Label: Protective Prayer
ProtectivePrayer.Description: Offers an ally Fortified 1+ against the next incoming attack.

PowerStrike.Label: Power Strike
PowerStrike.Description: Spend power to make a strike hit much harder than usual.

TrippingHook.Label: Tripping Hook
TrippingHook.Description: Catch the extremities of a foe with a long hook to wrench them off balance or send them sprawling.

LockingBind.Label: Locking Bind
LockingBind.Description: Deepen a bind so that the target’s weapon stays locked more firmly in place.

PrecisionThrust.Label: Precision Thrust
PrecisionThrust.Description: Turn a strike into a precise thrust that gains extra accuracy for a brief moment.

PushThrough.Label: Push Through
PushThrough.Description: Drive a push harder, forcing the target back farther than a normal control move would.

Counterguard.Label: Counterguard
Counterguard.Description: Sharpen your defensive structure to gain a stronger guard against the next attack.

Drag.Label: Drag
Drag.Description: Use the weapon’s hook to yank a target toward you instead of shoving them away.

ShieldPull.Label: Shield Pull
ShieldPull.Description: Rip open and bind an opponent’s shield with the weapon’s leverage.

ShieldCover.Label: Shield Cover
ShieldCover.Description: Duck behind the shield to cover yourself from harm.

BreakStance.Label: Break Stance
BreakStance.Description: Turn a heavy strike into a stance-breaking blow that leaves the target more exposed.

Blackmagic.Label: Blackmagic
Blackmagic.Description: The caster folds a sliver of their life force into the spell.
